description:
As Himeno and the others are trying to get to the bottom of the mystery tool that Ximena found at her studio, Touko decides to give a pottery tool lesson in a quiz format.
When she sees them all having fun figuring it out, she remembers how it was for her when she was little.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nazo ga Nazo Yobu Dougei Bu
The Pottery Club of Endless Mysteries
